name: Laggy
description:
Laggy

Laggy is the robot, who’s entire life depends on WiFi zones.

As soon as he runs out of zone, Laggy can only
perform moves learned in the WiFi zone.
That means, Laggy will repeat pattern made under the light.
So he must FIND a new signal everytime he LOSTS one ... to keep alive.

Create unique patterns, find winning paths and complete puzzles.

The game was developed during 4-days Global Game Jam 2021.

Creators:
Tibor Zalabai & Martin Stancek

Credits:

AurynSky Asset, Cute Robot Marvin, PolygonCity
